Review: A family of four with two kids including a teanage girl, we stayed for a week at the Paradisus Punta Cana Reserve and had a wonderful time! The resort (regular and Reserve) is beautifully landscaped and organized. The pools are very nice and clean. There are over 10 restaurants with excellent and varied food, including fish, a nice choice of vegetables and fruits. The food is tasty and delicate, not the usual Caribbean resort food. Our room (master suite) at the Family Concierge building was spacious with a nice living area and large 2-area bathroom. The decoration is elegant (colonial style with ebony-coloured furniture. The service is fantastic and the waiters always smiling and accommodating. The hotel is extremeky clean. The beach area, separated in three areas (common area, Royal service for adults only and Reserve) is beautiful and offers cabanas and restaurants and bars. Waiters come to serve you at your chair. The beach is not crowded at all. Simply Paradise! Having stayed at other resorts in the Caribbeans and elsewhere, I have been astonished by this resort. The best ever!

Sold as 4* or 3+ depending on the booking site. Not even close. When I wished to cancel two of three nights booked, due to the substandard, they refused to give me a refund! The list of things wrong with this place, is too long. Just DON'T.

Sauberkeit im Innenhofbereich mit Bar negativ, trotz Ultra AI eingeschränkte Getränkekarte! Restaurant gute Erfahrung mit Speisen und deren Angebot Bar im UG nur gegen Cash!!! Was soll dann das teure Ultra AI???

Ett ok hotell, dock ganska lyhört om du har rum med dörr mot det stora torget med underhållning på kvällarna. Två stora pooler varav en uppvärmd. Aktiviteter för den som vill delta dagarna igenom. Maten smakade bra och det var mycket att välja på. Vinet  smakade inte speciellt gott men det fanns en mataffär i närheten med ett bra utbud. Rummen är stora men behöver renoveras.Läget är bra, ca 10 minuters promenad till stranden och mycket affärer på vägen dit.
